#Horizontal barchart
carhp.plot_bokeh(
    kind="barh",
    figsize =(1000,800),
    x="name",
    ylabel="Car Models", 
    title="Top 10 Car Features", 
    alpha=0.6,
    legend = "bottom_right",
    show_figure=True)

#Stacked horizontal bar
carhp.plot_bokeh.barh(
    figsize =(1000,800),
    x="name",
    stacked=True,
    ylabel="Car Models", 
    title="Top 10 Car Features", 
    alpha=0.6,
    legend = "bottom_right",
    show_figure=True)
